ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, when I first talked to the EQ people about having different eye colors, hair styles, and hair colors they told me that they would never be able to do it
ygData.messageBody:
Well, when I first talked to the EQ people about having different eye
colors, hair styles, and hair colors they told me that they would never be
able to do it bc it was too complex. Now they do have it. It just depends on
the programming advances they make.
luv,
-Su

Unfortunately, going by what they've said in the past, never gonna happen.
If adding ONE model (Iksar skellie pets for Iksar necros and SKs) sucks up
too much resources and would require too much recoding to be feasible, then
adding seperate, interchangable parts like taller collars or optional horns
for helms would likely fall under the same limitations.
----- Original Message -----
From: STG2 Pierce
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Thursday, August 21, 2003 1:32 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see
added?
Another thing I'd think would be cool is a feature that relates to the
armor dyes..molding, and tailoring any piece of gear you own to your own
liking. Like say if you were a ogre warrior and you didn't like the way
your helmet looked like, well you could go down to a forge or blacksmith and
pay a certain amount to have them mold the helmet anyway you would
like..maybe you would like horns on the helmet or a certain design ecthed on
it..and for casters you could go to a tailor somewhere and have them design
your robe a certain way..maybe you would like longer sleeves or a slit in
your robe or a fancy collar.
